cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONS.From:- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched:- 11 p,m. 2. 1. 18. Received :- 2 a.m. 3. 1. 18,10086 January 2nd, evening. '3rd Army. Enemy concentrated heavy and medium artillery fire on M. Spresiano on night of January 1st,.- At 9 p,iru enemy tried to cross ?iave at Intestadura using ten boats but failed.4th Army. Nothing of importance to report. 1st Army. Moderate artillery activity from Garda to the Astico. Enemy heavy and medium guns shelled M. Asolone M* Coston and M. Grappa area.Aerial activity. Night of January 1st enemy carried out raids over Bassano, Cast el franco-) Monte Belluno, Treviso, Mestre and Padova. Have not yet received reports as to damage.
